snippet: Nearly two decades after he attacked the contemporary art world on “60 Minutes,” Mr. Safer filed a relatively toothless, clueless report from Art Basel Miami Beach on Sunday night.
abstract: Nearly two decades after he attacked the contemporary art world on “60 Minutes,” Mr. Safer filed a relatively toothless, clueless report from Art Basel Miami Beach on Sunday night.

headline.main: Safer Looks at Art but Only Hears the Cash Register
headline.print_headline: Critic’s Notebook: Safer Looks at Art but Only Hears the Cash Register
